WorkItem.Description:
First of all thank you for providing this tool.

 

I have a problem with old web.config files with a namespace defined in the configuration tag, that causes an error when running the transformation. This is caused by a bug that has been fixed in Visual Studio 2010 SP1.

 

A new build using the latest Microsoft.Web.Publishing.Tasks.dll would be much appreciated.

Comments.Message: sorry, tool is not supported anymore. I don't use it and I don't have a time to upgrade anything. but feel free to use sources to build your own version!
